Recently we added some new payment options, ShopPay, Google Pay and Apple Pay,

settings.richtext_data:
To make these payment options available and provide ongoing future improvements, we are migrating your account and all of your order history to a new store.

This means you will need to reactivate your existing account with us and we've made this as painless as possible.

If you already recieved your new account activation email then you can login to your account here.

If not, follow these steps below.

  1. Use the form below to enter your.
  2. You will revieve an account activation to your email address.
  3. Click on the button in the account activation email.
